books.name: Body Love Every Day
books.author: Kelly Leveque
books.openion: Celebrity nutritionist Kelly Leveque, is known for helping big-name celebs and normal people alike eat healthier and find a balanced approach to eating.

books.name: In the FLO
books.author: Alisa Vitti
books.openion: In the Flo, is all about how women can understand their hormones better and biohack their lives to feel better, manage their energy, perform better at work and more.

books.name: Boundless
books.author: Ben Greenfield
books.openion: If you're a fan of Tim Ferris or Dave Asperey, you'll be into this book, which follows in the footsteps of their work on biohacking and self-improvement.
